code_snippet:
if username is None:
            raise ValueError("Username cannot be None")
        userinfo = normalizers.normalize_username(username)

        if password is not None:
            userinfo = "{}:{}".format(
                userinfo,
                normalizers.normalize_password(password),
            )

        return URIBuilder(
            scheme=self.scheme,
            userinfo=userinfo,
            host=self.host,
            port=self.port,
            path=self.path,
            query=self.query,
            fragment=self.fragment,
        )
